title: Installing a Toolchain
description: To install the software components required to build the Zephyr kernel on a Mac, you will need to build a cross compiler for the target devices you wish to build for and install tools that the build system requires.

steps.title: Using a 3rd party toolchain
description: If a toolchain is available for the architecture you plan to build for, then you can use it [as explained in the Zephyr documentation](http://docs.zephyrproject.org/getting_started/getting_started.html#third-party-x-compilers).
An example of an available 3rd party toolchain is GCC ARM Embedded for the Cortex-M family of cores.
